name: Super Racer
details: The Super Racer toy car is built for speed and excitement. With its sleek design and high-performance features, it's sure to provide hours of fun for any racing enthusiast.

name: Turbo Boost
details: The Turbo Boost toy car is all about power and acceleration. It comes with a turbocharged engine and advanced aerodynamics to give you the ultimate racing experience.

name: Nitro Speedster
details: The Nitro Speedster toy car is designed for adrenaline junkies. It features a nitro-fueled engine that delivers lightning-fast speeds and jaw-dropping performance on the racetrack.
